abilities.name: Soul Burn
abilities.description: Silences a target enemy for a while. At the end of the duration, a portion of all damage they took during the silence is dealt to them again, as magical damage.
notes: The damage counter accumulates all damage instances dealt to the Soul Burn target within the last 5 seconds
The accumulated damage is based on the actual damage taken, after all damage manipulation is applied
Does not include damage with the HP Removal or the no-reflection flag
The damage is summed up into and applied as a single instance at the end of the duration, sourced to the caster of Soul Burn
The accumulated damage is only applied if the debuff expires naturally, it does not trigger if the debuff gets dispelled
Re-casting Soul Burn on the same target refreshes the duration, but does not reset the already accumulated damage

additionalInfo: This item is shown as a Team Item in the shop window when purchased by an ally
If a Bloodthorn was purchased as well, Bloodthorn's icon takes priority
The item's attributes grant 120 mana, 0.5 mana regeneration and 1% flat base magic resistance
Grants 10 main attack damage to intelligence heroes
Grants 4.5 main attack damage to universal heroes
